reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nI don't really understand the game, but it seems that if you spend time studying the gene" (code in the lab) then you can possibly make great stuff. I'm going to give this one a recommendation
date:
simply because I like the concept and it seems there's a ton of growth room for this game.

Stuff it currently lacks:
Save - Load options
Game speed option
Doesn't save options (music-sound volumes)

But the mechanics behind the game are complex and seem solid
recommended: so I'm hopeful that it's going to grow a lot."

reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nLooking forward to seeing where this game goes! It's pretty fun where it's at right now and it clearly has a strong underlying engine so you definitely feel a lot of enjoyment watching your critters grow (especially if you open up your world to play with a couple of friends)
